root.name: Debate It!
root.description:
http://www.debateitgame.com https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/debate-it!/id565663894?ls=1&mt=8 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.soapbox.debateit http://www.facebook.com/DebateItGame http://www.twitter.com/DebateItGame
Debate It! The ONLY debating game for iOS and Android!
Debate It - the game where you score points on your opinions!
Play against people around the world by submitting opinions on topics. Then comes the decision on who has made the most of their moment.
Are you ready for the challenge?
